pages.text: A sword made from Shockmetal has increase abilities on top of its improvements over netherite. $(br) The sword will apply a short regen effect when attacking un-dead and also cause them to burst into flames! this effect however does not happen everytime...

The sword also has a charge level that increases everytime an entity is killed with the sword and can be used in an AOE attack around the player by Shift + Right clicking after gaining 5 levels. $(br) A multiplier is applied after 10 levels and a max multiplier if 20 charges are stored.

A Shockmetal grenade can be thrown to deliver explosive damage. The grenade applies the same effects as the sword to un-dead causing them to burst into flames. It also appears to have the same effect as lighting on other mobs...

A full armour set can be crafted from shockmetal ingots providing a slight increase in protection over netherite but with a much greater knockback resistance. The armour also protects the user from fire damage if a full set is worn.
